ygData.subject: Addition to petition
ygData.msgSnippet: Have you noticed how all the spell casters have been visually screwed? Only robes, and that s it. You look like your grandma in her bathrobe. Oh well, I can
ygData.messageBody:
Have you noticed how all the spell casters have been visually screwed?
Only robes, and that's it. You look like your grandma in her bathrobe.
Oh well, I can live with that. What really annoyed me was that the Skull
of Jhen'Tra doesn't show up in our hands! There are many types of skull
pictures in the game, even a staff with a skull! So why when I hold my
skull does it look like a bag of s***?

Add that to the complaints list, if you don't mind.

--
Qenelin
